verbose_text: The combination of Cr (VI) and MEL further enhanced the ascorbic acid, tocopherol, and glutathione contents and the maximum respective increase was observed in the case of Cr (VI) x 500 ppm MEL.
evidence: Cr(VI) and MEL further enhanced the ascorbic acid, tocopherol, and glutathione contents and the maximum respective increase was observed in the case of Cr(VI) x 500 ppm MEL
